name: Jreng Jreng
description:
Hey, can I join you?

Sure.. if you want to!


Jreng Jreng is a short experimental experience made for #ue4jam spring 2018.

Here, you'll play as an unnamed musician, wandering around the city, trying to transform people to become your fans.  

And who knows, maybe you'll even find a friend to share the journey along the way!


Known Issues:
- Friend not showing but song continues to the next one. Please reset the game :/

External assets:

- Polygon City - Synty Studio

- Music by Joe Reynolds - Professorlamp | jrtheories.webs.com
